description: The Innominata ML Jacket Men is a true classic and is characterized by its trendy retro style. High-quality Polartec® Thermal Pro® fleece insulates the jacket and has an optimal warmth-to-weight ratio. As a Mammut Easy Combine product, the mid-layer is perfect for combining with other products for a functional and practical layering look that cold temperatures can’t touch.
name: Mammut Innominata ML Jacket - Mens
